text:
@NYGovCuomo As we see other states prematurely opening like South Carolina and Georgia, I've prided myself on New York's response to protect all of its citizens. However, why should construction workers put themselves at risk during this COVID-19 crisis?
https://t.co/tpZ2u9T6ev
